jetset.data_loader Module¶

Moudule: data_loader¶

This module contains all the classes necessary to load SED data from a file. The most effective way to import the SED data is to create an object instance of ObsData class.

Classes and Inheritance Structure¶

Classes relations¶

Summary¶

ObsData([data_file, dupl_filter, …]) This class provides a powerful interface to load observational data stored in a file.

Module API¶
